long_description: Lay down solid carves on steep hills with the Arbor Highground Downhill longboard. Featuring a stiff and stable deck with grippy deck tape, this board gives you the confidence to really let it rip. Built with 9 layers of sustainably sourced hard rock maple and a koa veneer basesheet for lightweight, solid performance. GatorGrip(R) tape couples a long-wearing surface with highly aggressive grit. 72mm, 78a durometer wheels provide excellent carve, downhill and slide performance; they'll help you manage speed, drifting and high-powered turning. Arbor Highground Downhill longboard includes ABEC 5 bearings with spacers and Paris 180mm trucks.
